name: Nada
description:
Nada is my entry for Ludum Dare 45, with a theme of "Start with nothing," I center the game around a bee too lazy to do his job, that the flowers are throwing themselves towards him.

HOW TO PLAY
Control Nada the lazy bee, and help him avoid the wave of flowers that our throwing themselves towards him.

CONTROLS
Movement:  WASD or Arrow Keys
Pause: P or Escape Key

TOOLS
Audacity
Bfxr
Gimp
Inkscape Studio
Kdenlive
LMMS
OBS
Unity3D Visual Studio Community
VLC

BGM BY TEKNOAXE
